name: jira-diff-highlighter
description: Improves readability of Jira ticket diffs.
author: https://github.com/richiehowelll

scripts.dev:chrome: node build.js chrome  && web-ext run -s dist/chrome  --target=chromium
scripts.dev:firefox: node build.js firefox && web-ext run -s dist/firefox
scripts.build:chrome: node build.js chrome  && cross-zip dist/chrome  jira-diff-highlighter.zip
scripts.build:firefox: node build.js firefox && web-ext build     -s dist/firefox
scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
